Address.value: 7000 EAST 1ST AVENUE,SUITE 1900, SCOTTSDALE, Arizona, 85251-4304, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Pursuit Attractions and Hospitality, Inc. is an attractions and hospitality company. The Company owns and operates a collection of experiences in destinations in the United States, Canada, and Iceland. The Company's hospitality experiences include approximately 15 point-of-interest attractions and approximately 28 distinctive lodges, along with integrated restaurants, retail and transportation that enable visitors to discover and connect with national parks and global travel locations. Its attractions include Columbia Icefield adventure, Columbia Icefield skywalk, Kenai Fjords tours, Sky Lagoon, Golden Skybridge, Flyover Canada, Flyover Iceland, and Flyover Las Vegas. Its lodges include The Banff Jasper Collection, Glacier Park Lodging, and Alaskan Lodges and Cabins. It has collection of flyover attractions in the cities of Vancouver, Reykjavik, Las Vegas, and Chicago. Lodging in Glacier Park include Prince of Wales Hotel, Paddle Ridge, and Grouse Mountain Lodge.
